channel.title: 317 DestructionPvP #1 PvP/PvM/Skill | 24/7 | Torva+Primal+DClaws+Godswords | Eco
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i33.servimg.com/u/f33/18/40/43/16/i_logo10.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Download Client (Jar File) [URL=http://"http://paradox.byethost10.com/play.html"]Play now (Webclient)[/URL] [URL=http://"http://destructionpvp.forumotion.com"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://paradox.byethost10.com"]Destruction Official Website [/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B]Feature's:[/B]
Working 100% Webclient! HighScores *BEING ADDED SOON* In-Game HighScores added 602 Anims + GFX 602 NPCS 634 Items Summoning Pets Perfect Pking System Fixed Turmoil Working Prayer Working Vengeance Player Kill Yell Ranking Working Slayer Task's and points. Working Mage Points. Fixed Teleblock. Fixed Dupe Bug. Moved Shops Change Donator Commands. Dual Arena, Dupe fixed Yell KBD Titles *Will be released on version 3! Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Warriors Guild All Chaotics Full Torva Full Primal Full Promethium Full Novice Pet baby dragons Pet cats + dogs Vesta, Statius, Etc. Overloads All Godswords + Specs Dragon Claws + Spec Report Abuse Flawless PvP and PvM 24/7 Uptime no lag - EVER Donator Zone Vote4cash *There are much more features! Check it out!
[B]SKILLS:[/B] ** - Runecrafting * - Summoning -Will be released on V.3 ** - Agility ** - Herblore ** - Theiving ** - Crafting ** - Fletching ** - Slayer ** - Hunter ** - Mining ** - Fishing ** - Smithing ** - Cooking ** - Firemaking ** - Woodcutting ** - Farming
** = Finished 0 = Not started * = Started
Summoning is almost finished, and will be released when the next version comes out! We are currently on version 2.
!ATTENTION! WE ARE CURRENTLY UNDERSTAFFED STAFF POSITIONS CAN AND WILL BE FILLED UNDER MY DECISION!
Owner: Kyle Co-Owner: Leetmero Developers: Paradox Head Administrator: None Administrators: 1 Moderators: None Support: Gravitas Donators: None
Even check out the pictures of some of the awesome features, this isn't even close to all of it! Join us now and take full effect of all features!
